byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Clay Bolton, Posey Gruener, Emily Palmer, Natalie Pita, Rita Pyrillis and Ryan Schuessler.

abstract: Harry Potter fans from around country descend on BookCourt store in Cobble Hill section of Brooklyn for midnight book-release party for script of hit play Harry Potter and the Cursed Child.

headline.print_headline: Long Lines, Costumes and an Owl Welcome a New ‘Harry Potter’
headline.main: Like Magic, Muggles Make New Harry Potter Play Disappear From Bookstores

keywords.value: Harry Potter and the Cursed Child (Play)
keywords.name: creative_works

snippet: From Brooklyn to Seattle, fans of the book and film series turned out at midnight on Saturday for the release of “Harry Potter and the Cursed Child.”...
lead_paragraph: From Brooklyn to Seattle, fans of the book and film series turned out at midnight on Saturday for the release of “Harry Potter and the Cursed Child.”
